title: Fullstack Developer (Java, Angular)
description:
About the projectWe develop and support software platform composed of numerous modules and features to cover the entire corporate credit chain process used to serve corporate clients and large institutions. System is used worldwide in 50 countries internally by thousands of employees since 2019. We run interesting projects including programs covering Net-Zero Banking Alliance and Environment, Social & Governance.We use Scrum with monthly deployments to few worldwide production sites. System is developed by several feature teams with 5-10 members each cooperating from France, India, Poland.  New Polish tech hub started operations in 2023, launching interesting new projects. We provide good environment for technical skill development as we have talents within local and global teams who share knowledge and provide support to others.
Your responsibilitiesDevelop software as per project requirements within a multiyear defined roadmapWork with the team on shaping the software to match user expectations as best as possibleMaintain good quality solutions by focusing on the needs, software quality with good test coverage and code reviewsPerform estimation and planning and proactive status reportingBe friendly, supportive and share knowledge with other team membersHybrid work with min 1 day a week at the Warsaw office

description:

title: Fullstack .NET developer
description:
About the projectOur Client (based in the USA) is dedicated to developing integrated software solutions for stop-loss insurance, catering to various stakeholders such as brokers. The project is an entirely new system implementation built using Blazor and ABP.IO frameworks, while maintaining integration with an older system developed in ASP.NET MVC. Client has a set of web applications (multi-tenant architecture).

title: IBM Maximo Developer
description:
About the projectWe are seeking experienced IBM Maximo Developers to collaborate on impactful U.S.-based projects. If you are passionate about leveraging your Maximo expertise to deliver innovative solutions and support critical projects, we encourage you to apply. This role is perfect for professionals with a strong background in Maximo configuration, customization, and administration who are eager to translate business requirements into tailored technical solutions.Our Client is a U.S.-based company with nearly 30 years of experience in delivering IT solutions and services. They specialize in serving the government sector and a wide range of industries, including manufacturing, utilities, finance, oil & gas, and more.
Your responsibilitiesConfigure and customize IBM Maximo to align with client business processes and requirements.Translate customer requirements into technical specifications, designs, and implementations.Manage all phases of the Maximo implementation lifecycle, including testing, deployment, and post-deployment support.Develop and maintain Maximo integrations using the Maximo Integration Framework (MIF).Analyze existing workflows and identify opportunities for optimization or enhancement within Maximo.Create and execute comprehensive Maximo testing plans to ensure functionality meets client requirements.Provide training and develop documentation on Maximo features, best practices, and user processes.Troubleshoot technical issues related to Maximo or its integrations, ensuring timely resolution.Design and implement custom solutions, reports, or modules to address unique client needs.Support system upgrades, apply patches, and manage ongoing Maximo system maintenance.
Our requirementsMinimum of 5 years of experience with IBM Maximo, particularly in Supply Chain and/or Nuclear environments.Proficiency in configuring, customizing, and administering Maximo systems.Expertise in Maximo Integration Framework, Maximo Object Structures, and Rules configurations.Strong programming skills in Java, JavaScript, XML, SQL, and related languages.Deep knowledge of WebSphere Architecture and Maximo data structures, application designer, security, and workflow development.Exceptional problem-solving skills for identifying and resolving complex technical issues.Effective communication skills, with the ability to convey technical concepts to diverse audiences.Highly organized, detail-oriented, and capable of working independently.Familiarity with best practices for system upgrades, patches, and user training.Fluent English language skills
